column1: Here's the list of microservices derived from the modular monolith requirements:

column2: User registration; User authentication; Password hashing and salting
Serve web pages (registration/login); Route user requests; Forward to audio listing after login
Coordinate media operations; Process download requests; Fetch audio files; Forward watermarked files
Digitally watermark audio files; Re-encode files before watermarking
Convert audio files to different bit rates; Reduce file sizes
Archive multiple audio files into compressed files; Handle bulk downloads
Manage audio file metadata; Store uploaded files; Fetch available audio files list
Create queries for audio file retrieval; Database access for audio metadata
Encapsulate database access for user data; Create user-related queries
Store user information; Store salted password hashes; Store audio file metadata
Physical storage for audio files; Decouple storage from database
